name: ShapesXR
abstract: ShapesXR is a collaborative design tool for spatial apps and games.

detail.app_release_note:
Improvements:

-Improved text for Scale Gizmo (show scale instead of size)
-Implement axis line display for the gizmo handle upon touching it
-Improved switching between the surface snapping button and world snapping button
-Add extra import resolution UI options (0.33, 0.25, 0.1)
-Implemented additional protection authentication during a device pause
-Enabled shadows in the new spaces by default

Fixes:

-Fixed when the "Increase quality" button is on by default for new spaces
-Fixed when unable to pair device if time is set manually
-Fixed when shadows don't work in Play mode
-Fixed some errors during Play mode with interactivity
-Fixed wrong offset in Play mode when content follows user space
-Fixed when in Play mode pop-up forms are not interactable
-Renamed template
-Fixed when after exiting the Play mode, the previously selected tool stops working
-Fixed specific error during Play mode with interactivity
